programme.title: The Masked Singer S2
programme.desc: The Masked Singer is a singing competition guessing game based on the Korean format King of Mask Singer. The performers are celebrities wearing elaborate head to toe costumes to conceal their identities from the host, panelists, audience, and other contestants.

programme.title: America's Got Talent: The Champions
programme.desc: The premise is to round up the winners and/or most notable contestants from seasons 1-13 and have them face off head-to-head to see who is the ultimate America's Got Talent top act. America's Got Talent: The Champions will not just showcase the very best from the U.S. apparently. The show will pull top acts from global versions of the AGT franchise too.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S21
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: The Sanctuary: Survival Stories of the Alps
programme.desc: An amazing survival story following the adventures of a she-wolf as she travels across the Alps in search of a safe place to bring up her cubs. Along the way her path crosses many animals who have made this harsh landscape their home, from the bear to the golden eagle. Each animal story reveals the strategy that has allowed it to survive. It's a spectacular and beautiful series that tells the little-known animal life stories hidden deep in the heart of Europe. From the makers of WildFrance.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S38

programme.desc: The Great British Bake Off is the ultimate baking battle where passionate amateur baking competitors, young and old, from every background and every corner of Britain attempts to impress the judges through their baking prowess to be crowned the UK's Best Amateur Baker.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S4
programme.desc: The children go for an adventure through the Jungle. But some of them aren't able to do certain things as well as the others. Will they give up and get left behind? Chalky receives a cactus, but the children feel that the cactus would be better off back home with its real family. The children go on an adventure in search of the cactus's real home and family.

programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus S5
programme.desc: Little buses go to the United States because of Tayo who applied for the "Hollywood Shooting Field Trip" program. Little buses that arrive in the United States decide to take a tour before the field trip, but those who are dissatisfied with Tayo's arbitrary actions will fight Tayo and enjoy sightseeing separately. On the other hand, Tayo loses the ticket, but is misunderstood as a staff and accidentally enters the shooting site and meets famous actor 'Miley'.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: Imp steals Sloppy's snow machine and uses it to build his own ice fortress. Ollie and gang infiltrate his fortress to get it back. The gang befriend a wild deer, but it struggles to adapt to city living.

programme.title: Tall Tales
programme.desc: Logline There's no more Crampistop, the remedy that fights cramps in all the bees and can only be made from Wendy's venom. But how can they convince her to give them a few drops?

programme.desc: Polly takes Jack to one of London's oldest Eel and Pie shops to meet the owner and sample their jellied eels while learning all about the popular history of eel in Britain. He then cooks a version at home in Cornwall for the very first time, before heading to nearby Girona, Spain, where he gets the jitters at serving this old and outdated recipe.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the ranger's mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the ranger's latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Space Nova
programme.desc: Jet, Adelaide, Sol (and a visiting Marcie Yang) are thrown together to represent Luna Port in a grav ball game for visiting delegates - they just aren't the best team. Then, in the middle of the game, Luna Port faces a catastrophic shut-down and blackout. Now this not-so-awesome foursome really must learn to work together - and the stakes couldn't be higher. Meanwhile, Aubrina goes in search of plans for the Star Dust cube to create her own!

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots Academy S2

programme.title: Zero Hero
programme.desc: A weekly half hour series revolving around a Singaporean superhero family, The Magnificent Heroes, who have mysteriously lost all their super powers and now struggle to be like the average human being. Facing daily problems of homework, rudeness, pollution, office politics, busybody neighbours, bullying, peer pressure, relationships, the list is endless. Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

A bond develops between Sam and Sherlock, the dog. Just as they seem to be drawing close to each other, the family receives a surprise visit from the dog's owner, who wants his pet back.

programme.title: 食分绝配
programme.desc: 听起来复杂无比的化学反应其实只需要三种基本成分-高温、氨基酸和还原糖。美拉德是擅长把食物分子转化为宜人可口风味的反应，却又是如此地基本而常受到忽略。这 次的风味搭配之旅，杨应晖从传统的砂煲饭开始，再探索中式叉烧和西式烤鸡排，看它们如何善用食材把美拉德风味推向更高峰；启发他尝试重叠美拉德反应的烹调法。.

programme.title: 香港原味道 （第四辑）

programme.desc: Our Cantik Detektif travels to Hangzhou and GuangXi, China where she experiences traditional beauty treatments and therapies that are still being practised today. This time Huda gets first hand experience to see how pearls turn to beauty products, learns make-up trends from the Tang Dynasty and tries the ancient hair care, rice water shampoo!

programme.title: Destinasi Bayu
programme.desc: Let Enn Xaviera takes you to Kampung Look Buton where the villagers plant and breed seaweed for their daily life. She will also share, favorite local traditional dish among the people of Semporna, ‘ Kerabu Rumput Laut' which is simple and easy to prepare.

programme.title: SNAP
programme.desc: What was worn hundreds of years ago are most likely not worn again today, for practicality reasons. SNAP looks into the past to learn about the heavily adorned and decorated costumes by dignitaries and royals and compare that to present times where clothes are more casual and non-restricting. We learn about the intricate handmade art of "sulaman" that may take months to make but does it fit into the "now" culture where everything is needed and gotten "instantly"?

programme.title: Cucu Tauke Beras
programme.desc: Irsya visits Kaka in the hospital and seek forgiveness from her. Irfan and Tuan Hazali finally make amends after many years. Irsya gets jealous when she sees Atikah's engagement ring given by Harris.

programme.title: Pesan Pada Hati
programme.desc: Yusuf is pleasantly surprised to see Maryam back home. While catching up with his sister, he informs her that he has fallen for someone, much to Dina's dismay. Amir receives an unexpected phone call from Aakif.

programme.title: Check-In Cinta
programme.desc: Check in Cinta reveals the love & romantic life of celebrities behind the world of glamor. They shared the experience of getting to know each other before becoming a married couple that many may not know.

programme.title: Hard to Heart
programme.desc: Endearingly known as Abil amongst family and friends, Nabila Huda, daughter of rock singer Amy Search, keeps her personal life private and away from prying eyes. Join her as she shares exclusive details about her life, sorrows and frustration as a famous celebrity in this episode.

programme.title: Syurgaku Tak Sempurna 2

programme.title: The Maid
programme.desc: Jay's fourth wife, Elisa is murdered after she was chosen to go on a trip to Europe with him. His other wives, Suhana, Nadia and Fika suspect each other of killing her. Later, Kak Mel surrenders herself to the police and a mysterious lady introduces herself as a new maid in the house.Suhana refuses to believe Kak Mel is the murderer. With Remy's help, they try to find out Citra's identity. Meanwhile, Yana pressures and forces Citra to confess who she really is.

programme.title: Kelab Prefect
programme.desc: Farah was injured while doing food delivery and affected her other duties. Alia and Kael disagree about Adam. Firaz, Luq and Adam threaten Haziq to buy them snacks and they are almost caught by Ah Seng. Adam did not attend the Prefect Club meeting.
